nodes.text: Eskil Abon Santhe was the Imperial governor of the Outer Rim planet of Garel. Santhe was widely known to accept bribes from several criminal organizations, including the Black Sun and the Broken Horn Syndicate, allowing them to operate on Garel with impunity. This criminal element attracted bounty hunters, smugglers, and other criminals.

Eskil Abon Santhe was first mentioned in Dawn of Rebellion, a canon roleplaying 2018 sourcebook that is based on Star Wars Rebels and Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The book was published by Fantasy Flight Games and was authored by John Dunn, Tom Sorenson, Sterling Hershey, Jonathan Julius, Keith Ryan Kappel, Tim Huckelberry, Jason Marker, and James M. Spahn.
